exercises.css: .container-result {          background: lightsalmon;          border: 3px solid black;          border-radius: 10px;          display: grid;          grid-template-columns: minmax(100px, 1fr) 1fr 1fr;          grid-template-rows: repeat(3, 100px);} .container-result div {              background: lightblue;              border: 2px solid #08f;              border-radius: 6px;              margin-bottom: 5%;          }          @media (width<500px) {              .container {                  grid-template-columns: 1fr;              }          }
